talk.author: did:plc:w7ilbizntw3md6pgv4b6m57e
talk.utter: Changing our defaults out from under us is in fact not the best.

talk.author: did:plc:jwxw6aj54p7btvi7sjucuckd
talk.utter: I dont think it changes if you already set a default tho

talk.author: did:plc:w7ilbizntw3md6pgv4b6m57e
talk.utter:
If the old default was fine for you, which is likely the vast majority of users, why would you ever set it at anything?

That's the problem, they changed the default for nearly everyone on the ap instead of making it opt-in.
